nodes.text: The A43 Hushabye pistol was a blaster pistol owned by Coruscant Security Force Lieutenant Tan Divo. He wore the blaster on the left side of his police utility belt with the handle facing forward.

The A43 Hushabye pistol first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series episode "Senate Murders" which aired on March 19, 2010. It also briefly appeared in the episode "Sphere of Influence," which aired on October 1, 2010. It should be noted that chronologically "Sphere of Influence" occurs before "Senate Murders." It was first identified in Tan Divo's entry in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars Character Encyclopedia, published on June 21, 2010.
